definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: The crack initiation time determined the composite's toughness.
sentences.chinese: 木粉对裂纹引发时间的影响最为显著。

sentences.english: Cracks have appeared on the dam's surface and workshops at the site have collapsed .
sentences.chinese: 紫坪铺水坝的表面出现了裂纹，周围的工场也已坍塌。

sentences.english: The initiation toughness has a linear relationship with stretch zone width in the weldment.
sentences.chinese: 裂纹尖端的延伸区宽度和起裂韧性具有良好的关系。

sentences.english: While tempering after drying can reduced fissure Occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 干燥后润谷可减少裂纹的发生。

sentences.english: The welding repair technology and method of copper tile cracks were presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了铜瓦裂纹的焊接返修工艺及其措施。

sentences.english: Crazing is the invariable precursor of brittle fracture.
sentences.chinese: 出现小裂纹必然是脆性断裂的前兆。

sentences.english: The indentation cracks propagation is typified by an intergranular and transgranular mixed mode .
sentences.chinese: 压痕裂纹扩展为沿晶和穿晶混合模式。

sentences.english: Three structures have exhibited cracking at the ends of flange gusset plates.
sentences.chinese: 已有三个结构在翼缘节点板端部出现了裂纹。

sentences.english: However, the crack detection rate and reliability of these methods need further study.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这些方法的裂纹检出率和可靠性需要深入研究。

sentences.english: The surface density of cracks increases with the increasing of the degree of pre-damage.
sentences.chinese: 随着预损伤程度的增加，裂纹面密度增大。

sentences.english: The reasons for crack appearance in LPG spherical tank and the methods for prevention.
sentences.chinese: 介绍液化石油气球罐检验中裂纹形成原因及预防措施。

sentences.english: Varnish applied over wet paint is likely to crackle.
sentences.chinese: 清漆涂在未干的油漆上可能会产生裂纹。

sentences.english: Opacity is due to crazes in the resin .
sentences.chinese: 不透明是因树脂中产生裂纹。

sentences.english: However, the correct weld filler metal must be used to eliminate cracking.
sentences.chinese: 然而，必须使用正确的焊料金属以减少裂纹。

sentences.english: With an aim at some engineering structure features, a single-edge double-crack model is designed.
sentences.chinese: 针对某些工程结构特点，设计了单边双裂纹模型。

sentences.english: But work crews had begun to tape up the cracked glass.
sentences.chinese: 但是，工作人员已开始修复裂纹玻璃。

definition: to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
veined pattern/wrinkles/vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
